name: Speed Dating for Ghosts
description: Branching dialogue! Hard choices! A cemetery's worth of phantoms, wraiths, and poltergeists lookin' for love in all the blight places. Speed Dating for Ghosts is a weird dating sim made by a former BioWare dev and his indie rapper friend.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 410 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Storage: 410 MB available space
